critique: This document is an executive order regarding the transfer of policy functions to the Director of the Office of Management and Budget. It does not directly address issues related to ideological tilt, immigration, federalism, national security vs. civil liberties, economic regulation, or social inclusion. The order primarily concerns the organization and management of government functions. Therefore, most axes should be scored as neutral. The executive power axis is also neutral, as the order simply shifts responsibilities within the executive branch without significantly expanding or restricting executive authority.
